text: Munthu wamkazi wosakwatiwa akachita chigololo ndi munthu wamwamuna wosakwatira, mukwapule aliyense wa iwo zikoti zana limodzi ndipo musalole kuti chifundo chikulepheretseni kumvera lamulo la Mulungu ngati inu mumakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndi tsiku lomaliza. Ndipo onetsetsani kuti chilango chawo chachitidwa umboni ndi anthu ambiri okhulupirira
